Game.Risk

Class MapEditorDataHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Risk.MapEditorDataHolder

  • public class MapEditorDataHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class to hold the data throughout the map editor phase.
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    ndkcha

      • getInstance

        public static MapEditorDataHolder getInstance()
        Get the instance of the singleton class. It first checks if there is an existing instance. If not, then it creates a new one.
        Returns:
